<Link id="l00010" /><CodeLine lineNumber="10"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00011" /><CodeLine lineNumber="11"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// This file defines the interleaved-load-combine pass. The pass searches for</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00012" /><CodeLine lineNumber="12"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// ShuffleVectorInstruction that execute interleaving loads. If a matching</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00013" /><CodeLine lineNumber="13"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// pattern is found, it adds a combined load and further instructions in a</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00014" /><CodeLine lineNumber="14"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// pattern that is detectable by InterleavedAccesPass. The old instructions are</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00015" /><CodeLine lineNumber="15"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// left dead to be removed later. The pass is specifically designed to be</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00016" /><CodeLine lineNumber="16"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// executed just before InterleavedAccesPass to find any left-over instances</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00017" /><CodeLine lineNumber="17"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// that are not detected within former passes.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00018" /><CodeLine lineNumber="18"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00019" /><CodeLine lineNumber="19"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//===----------------------------------------------------------------------===//</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00106" /><CodeLine lineNumber="106"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;; </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// InterleavedLoadCombine</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00107" /><CodeLine lineNumber="107"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00108" /><CodeLine lineNumber="108"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// First Order Polynomial on an n-Bit Integer Value</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00109" /><CodeLine lineNumber="109"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00110" /><CodeLine lineNumber="110"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Polynomial(Value) = Value &#42; B + A + E&#42;2^(n-e)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00111" /><CodeLine lineNumber="111"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00112" /><CodeLine lineNumber="112"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// A and B are the coefficients. E&#42;2^(n-e) is an error within &#39;e&#39; most</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00113" /><CodeLine lineNumber="113"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// significant bits. It is introduced if an exact computation cannot be proven</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00114" /><CodeLine lineNumber="114"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// (e.q. division by 2).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00115" /><CodeLine lineNumber="115"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00116" /><CodeLine lineNumber="116"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// As part of this optimization multiple loads will be combined. It necessary</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00117" /><CodeLine lineNumber="117"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// to prove that loads are within some relative offset to each other. This</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00118" /><CodeLine lineNumber="118"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// class is used to prove relative offsets of values loaded from memory.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00119" /><CodeLine lineNumber="119"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00120" /><CodeLine lineNumber="120"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Representing an integer in this form is sound since addition in two&#39;s</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00121" /><CodeLine lineNumber="121"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// complement is associative (trivial) and multiplication distributes over the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00122" /><CodeLine lineNumber="122"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// addition (see Proof(1) in Polynomial::mul). Further, both operations</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00123" /><CodeLine lineNumber="123"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// commute.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00124" /><CodeLine lineNumber="124"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00125" /><CodeLine lineNumber="125"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Example:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00126" /><CodeLine lineNumber="126"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// declare @fn(i64 %IDX, &lt;4 x float&gt;&#42; %PTR) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00127" /><CodeLine lineNumber="127"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   %Pa1 = add i64 %IDX, 2</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00128" /><CodeLine lineNumber="128"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   %Pa2 = lshr i64 %Pa1, 1</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00129" /><CodeLine lineNumber="129"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   %Pa3 = getelementptr inbounds &lt;4 x float&gt;, &lt;4 x float&gt;&#42; %PTR, i64 %Pa2</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00130" /><CodeLine lineNumber="130"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   %Va = load &lt;4 x float&gt;, &lt;4 x float&gt;&#42; %Pa3</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00131" /><CodeLine lineNumber="131"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00132" /><CodeLine lineNumber="132"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   %Pb1 = add i64 %IDX, 4</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00133" /><CodeLine lineNumber="133"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   %Pb2 = lshr i64 %Pb1, 1</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00134" /><CodeLine lineNumber="134"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   %Pb3 = getelementptr inbounds &lt;4 x float&gt;, &lt;4 x float&gt;&#42; %PTR, i64 %Pb2</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00135" /><CodeLine lineNumber="135"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   %Vb = load &lt;4 x float&gt;, &lt;4 x float&gt;&#42; %Pb3</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00136" /><CodeLine lineNumber="136"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// ... &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00137" /><CodeLine lineNumber="137"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00138" /><CodeLine lineNumber="138"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The goal is to prove that two loads load consecutive addresses.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00139" /><CodeLine lineNumber="139"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00140" /><CodeLine lineNumber="140"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// In this case the polynomials are constructed by the following</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00141" /><CodeLine lineNumber="141"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// steps.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00142" /><CodeLine lineNumber="142"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00143" /><CodeLine lineNumber="143"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The number tag #e specifies the error bits.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00144" /><CodeLine lineNumber="144"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00145" /><CodeLine lineNumber="145"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Pa&#95;0 = %IDX              #0</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00146" /><CodeLine lineNumber="146"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Pa&#95;1 = %IDX + 2          #0 | add 2</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00147" /><CodeLine lineNumber="147"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Pa&#95;2 = %IDX/2 + 1        #1 | lshr 1</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00148" /><CodeLine lineNumber="148"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Pa&#95;3 = %IDX/2 + 1        #1 | GEP, step signext to i64</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00149" /><CodeLine lineNumber="149"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Pa&#95;4 = (%IDX/2)&#42;16 + 16  #0 | GEP, multiply index by sizeof(4) for floats</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00150" /><CodeLine lineNumber="150"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Pa&#95;5 = (%IDX/2)&#42;16 + 16  #0 | GEP, add offset of leading components</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00151" /><CodeLine lineNumber="151"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00152" /><CodeLine lineNumber="152"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Pb&#95;0 = %IDX              #0</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00153" /><CodeLine lineNumber="153"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Pb&#95;1 = %IDX + 4          #0 | add 2</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00154" /><CodeLine lineNumber="154"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Pb&#95;2 = %IDX/2 + 2        #1 | lshr 1</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00155" /><CodeLine lineNumber="155"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Pb&#95;3 = %IDX/2 + 2        #1 | GEP, step signext to i64</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00156" /><CodeLine lineNumber="156"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Pb&#95;4 = (%IDX/2)&#42;16 + 32  #0 | GEP, multiply index by sizeof(4) for floats</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00157" /><CodeLine lineNumber="157"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Pb&#95;5 = (%IDX/2)&#42;16 + 16  #0 | GEP, add offset of leading components</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00158" /><CodeLine lineNumber="158"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00159" /><CodeLine lineNumber="159"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Pb&#95;5 - Pa&#95;5 = 16         #0 | subtract to get the offset</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00160" /><CodeLine lineNumber="160"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00161" /><CodeLine lineNumber="161"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Remark: %PTR is not maintained within this class. So in this instance the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00162" /><CodeLine lineNumber="162"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// offset of 16 can only be assumed if the pointers are equal.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00163" /><CodeLine lineNumber="163"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00164" /><CodeLine lineNumber="164" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-interleavedloadcombinepass-cpp-/polynomial"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">class </span><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-interleavedloadcombinepass-cpp-/polynomial/#a9125cd76962bcc439d4376d8610b74c2">Polynomial</a> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00165" /><CodeLine lineNumber="165"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Operations on B</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00166" /><CodeLine lineNumber="166"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">enum</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> BOps &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00167" /><CodeLine lineNumber="167"><span class="doxyHighlight">    LShr,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00168" /><CodeLine lineNumber="168"><span class="doxyHighlight">    Mul,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00169" /><CodeLine lineNumber="169"><span class="doxyHighlight">    SExt,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00170" /><CodeLine lineNumber="170"><span class="doxyHighlight">    Trunc,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00171" /><CodeLine lineNumber="171"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00172" /><CodeLine lineNumber="172"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00173" /><CodeLine lineNumber="173"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Number of Error Bits e</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00174" /><CodeLine lineNumber="174"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> ErrorMSBs = (unsigned)-1;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00175" /><CodeLine lineNumber="175"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00176" /><CodeLine lineNumber="176"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Value</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00177" /><CodeLine lineNumber="177"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;V = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">nullptr</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00178" /><CodeLine lineNumber="178"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00179" /><CodeLine lineNumber="179"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Coefficient B</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00180" /><CodeLine lineNumber="180"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvector">SmallVector&lt;std::pair&lt;BOps, APInt&gt;</a>, 4&gt; <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#ae76959fe811ba090de4cba69ac00f1da">B</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00181" /><CodeLine lineNumber="181"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00182" /><CodeLine lineNumber="182"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Coefficient A</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00183" /><CodeLine lineNumber="183"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint">APInt</a> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#a2e38c85003a042421cde1647632d0b72">A</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00184" /><CodeLine lineNumber="184"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00185" /><CodeLine lineNumber="185"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">public</span><span class="doxyHighlight">:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00186" /><CodeLine lineNumber="186" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-interleavedloadcombinepass-cpp-/polynomial/#a9125cd76962bcc439d4376d8610b74c2"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-interleavedloadcombinepass-cpp-/polynomial/#a9125cd76962bcc439d4376d8610b74c2">Polynomial</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;V) : V(V) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00187" /><CodeLine lineNumber="187"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/integertype">IntegerType</a> &#42;Ty = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a22eeee01734061ac1b31ccd994c49eef">dyn&#95;cast&lt;IntegerType&gt;</a>(V-&gt;getType());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00188" /><CodeLine lineNumber="188"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Ty) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00189" /><CodeLine lineNumber="189"><span class="doxyHighlight">      ErrorMSBs = 0;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00192" /><CodeLine lineNumber="192"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00201" /><CodeLine lineNumber="201" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-interleavedloadcombinepass-cpp-/polynomial/#a9fff86391ba2d67f86f73797b4fde21c"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-interleavedloadcombinepass-cpp-/polynomial/#a9fff86391ba2d67f86f73797b4fde21c">Polynomial</a>() = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">default</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00202" /><CodeLine lineNumber="202"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00203" /><CodeLine lineNumber="203"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Increment and clamp the number of undefined bits.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00204" /><CodeLine lineNumber="204" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-interleavedloadcombinepass-cpp-/polynomial/#a84aceefc69fca55a44b00abbe6c55a39"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-interleavedloadcombinepass-cpp-/polynomial/#a84aceefc69fca55a44b00abbe6c55a39">incErrorMSBs</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> amt) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00205" /><CodeLine lineNumber="205"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (ErrorMSBs == (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight">)-1)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00206" /><CodeLine lineNumber="206"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00207" /><CodeLine lineNumber="207"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00208" /><CodeLine lineNumber="208"><span class="doxyHighlight">    ErrorMSBs += amt;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00209" /><CodeLine lineNumber="209"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (ErrorMSBs &gt; <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#a2e38c85003a042421cde1647632d0b72">A</a>.getBitWidth())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00210" /><CodeLine lineNumber="210"><span class="doxyHighlight">      ErrorMSBs = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#a2e38c85003a042421cde1647632d0b72">A</a>.getBitWidth();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00211" /><CodeLine lineNumber="211"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00212" /><CodeLine lineNumber="212"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00213" /><CodeLine lineNumber="213"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Decrement and clamp the number of undefined bits.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00214" /><CodeLine lineNumber="214" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-interleavedloadcombinepass-cpp-/polynomial/#a655616f261657236062b1639e62c2bb6"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-interleavedloadcombinepass-cpp-/polynomial/#a655616f261657236062b1639e62c2bb6">decErrorMSBs</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> amt) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00215" /><CodeLine lineNumber="215"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (ErrorMSBs == (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight">)-1)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00216" /><CodeLine lineNumber="216"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00217" /><CodeLine lineNumber="217"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00218" /><CodeLine lineNumber="218"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (ErrorMSBs &gt; amt)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00219" /><CodeLine lineNumber="219"><span class="doxyHighlight">      ErrorMSBs -= amt;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00220" /><CodeLine lineNumber="220"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00221" /><CodeLine lineNumber="221"><span class="doxyHighlight">      ErrorMSBs = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00222" /><CodeLine lineNumber="222"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00223" /><CodeLine lineNumber="223"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00224" /><CodeLine lineNumber="224"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Apply an add on the polynomial</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00225" /><CodeLine lineNumber="225" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-interleavedloadcombinepass-cpp-/polynomial/#a13943fc34f01ec5aa7279d7171077696"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-interleavedloadcombinepass-cpp-/polynomial/#a9125cd76962bcc439d4376d8610b74c2">Polynomial</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-interleavedloadcombinepass-cpp-/polynomial/#a13943fc34f01ec5aa7279d7171077696">add</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint">APInt</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/callingconv/#ac6aa1387c4375260e2468eb5a77fdb4cafd841a49aec1539bc88abc8ff9e170fb">C</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00226" /><CodeLine lineNumber="226"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Note: Addition is associative in two&#39;s complement even when in case of</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00227" /><CodeLine lineNumber="227"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// signed overflow.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00228" /><CodeLine lineNumber="228"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00229" /><CodeLine lineNumber="229"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Error bits can only propagate into higher significant bits. As these are</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00230" /><CodeLine lineNumber="230"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// already regarded as undefined, there is no change.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00231" /><CodeLine lineNumber="231"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00232" /><CodeLine lineNumber="232"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Theorem: Adding a constant to a polynomial does not change the error</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00233" /><CodeLine lineNumber="233"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// term.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00234" /><CodeLine lineNumber="234"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00235" /><CodeLine lineNumber="235"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Proof:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00236" /><CodeLine lineNumber="236"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00237" /><CodeLine lineNumber="237"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   Since the addition is associative and commutes:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00238" /><CodeLine lineNumber="238"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00239" /><CodeLine lineNumber="239"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   (B + A + E&#42;2^(n-e)) + C = B + (A + C) + E&#42;2^(n-e)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00240" /><CodeLine lineNumber="240"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// &#91;qed&#93;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00241" /><CodeLine lineNumber="241"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00242" /><CodeLine lineNumber="242"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/callingconv/#ac6aa1387c4375260e2468eb5a77fdb4cafd841a49aec1539bc88abc8ff9e170fb">C</a>.getBitWidth() != <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#a2e38c85003a042421cde1647632d0b72">A</a>.getBitWidth()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00243" /><CodeLine lineNumber="243"><span class="doxyHighlight">      ErrorMSBs = (unsigned)-1;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00244" /><CodeLine lineNumber="244"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">this</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00245" /><CodeLine lineNumber="245"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00246" /><CodeLine lineNumber="246"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00247" /><CodeLine lineNumber="247"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#a2e38c85003a042421cde1647632d0b72">A</a> += <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/callingconv/#ac6aa1387c4375260e2468eb5a77fdb4cafd841a49aec1539bc88abc8ff9e170fb">C</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00248" /><CodeLine lineNumber="248"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">this</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00249" /><CodeLine lineNumber="249"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00250" /><CodeLine lineNumber="250"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00251" /><CodeLine lineNumber="251"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Apply a multiplication onto the polynomial.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00252" /><CodeLine lineNumber="252" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-interleavedloadcombinepass-cpp-/polynomial/#afa933051dac38f62739216d984595e05"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-interleavedloadcombinepass-cpp-/polynomial/#a9125cd76962bcc439d4376d8610b74c2">Polynomial</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-interleavedloadcombinepass-cpp-/polynomial/#afa933051dac38f62739216d984595e05">mul</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint">APInt</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/callingconv/#ac6aa1387c4375260e2468eb5a77fdb4cafd841a49aec1539bc88abc8ff9e170fb">C</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00253" /><CodeLine lineNumber="253"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Note: Multiplication distributes over the addition</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00254" /><CodeLine lineNumber="254"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00255" /><CodeLine lineNumber="255"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Theorem: Multiplication distributes over the addition</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00256" /><CodeLine lineNumber="256"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00257" /><CodeLine lineNumber="257"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Proof(1):</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00258" /><CodeLine lineNumber="258"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00259" /><CodeLine lineNumber="259"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   (B+A)&#42;C =-</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00260" /><CodeLine lineNumber="260"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//        = (B + A) + (B + A) + .. &#123;C Times&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00261" /><CodeLine lineNumber="261"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//         addition is associative and commutes, hence</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00262" /><CodeLine lineNumber="262"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//        = B + B + .. &#123;C Times&#125; .. + A + A + .. &#123;C times&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00263" /><CodeLine lineNumber="263"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//        = B&#42;C + A&#42;C</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00264" /><CodeLine lineNumber="264"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   (see (function add) for signed values and overflows)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00265" /><CodeLine lineNumber="265"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// &#91;qed&#93;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00266" /><CodeLine lineNumber="266"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00267" /><CodeLine lineNumber="267"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Theorem: If C has c trailing zeros, errors bits in A or B are shifted out</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00268" /><CodeLine lineNumber="268"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// to the left.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00269" /><CodeLine lineNumber="269"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00270" /><CodeLine lineNumber="270"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Proof(2):</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00271" /><CodeLine lineNumber="271"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00272" /><CodeLine lineNumber="272"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   Let B&#39; and A&#39; be the n-Bit inputs with some unknown errors EA,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00273" /><CodeLine lineNumber="273"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   EB at e leading bits. B&#39; and A&#39; can be written down as:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00274" /><CodeLine lineNumber="274"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00275" /><CodeLine lineNumber="275"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//     B&#39; = B + 2^(n-e)&#42;EB</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00276" /><CodeLine lineNumber="276"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//     A&#39; = A + 2^(n-e)&#42;EA</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00277" /><CodeLine lineNumber="277"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00278" /><CodeLine lineNumber="278"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   Let C&#39; be an input with c trailing zero bits. C&#39; can be written as</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00279" /><CodeLine lineNumber="279"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00280" /><CodeLine lineNumber="280"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//     C&#39; = C&#42;2^c</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00281" /><CodeLine lineNumber="281"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00282" /><CodeLine lineNumber="282"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   Therefore we can compute the result by using distributivity and</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00283" /><CodeLine lineNumber="283"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   commutativity.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00284" /><CodeLine lineNumber="284"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00285" /><CodeLine lineNumber="285"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//     (B&#39;&#42;C&#39; + A&#39;&#42;C&#39;) = &#91;B + 2^(n-e)&#42;EB&#93; &#42; C&#39; + &#91;A + 2^(n-e)&#42;EA&#93; &#42; C&#39; =</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00286" /><CodeLine lineNumber="286"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//                     = &#91;B + 2^(n-e)&#42;EB + A + 2^(n-e)&#42;EA&#93; &#42; C&#39; =</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00287" /><CodeLine lineNumber="287"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//                     = (B&#39;+A&#39;) &#42; C&#39; =</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00288" /><CodeLine lineNumber="288"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//                     = &#91;B + 2^(n-e)&#42;EB + A + 2^(n-e)&#42;EA&#93; &#42; C&#39; =</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00289" /><CodeLine lineNumber="289"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//                     = &#91;B + A + 2^(n-e)&#42;EB + 2^(n-e)&#42;EA&#93; &#42; C&#39; =</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00290" /><CodeLine lineNumber="290"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//                     = (B + A) &#42; C&#39; + &#91;2^(n-e)&#42;EB + 2^(n-e)&#42;EA)&#93; &#42; C&#39; =</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00291" /><CodeLine lineNumber="291"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//                     = (B + A) &#42; C&#39; + &#91;2^(n-e)&#42;EB + 2^(n-e)&#42;EA)&#93; &#42; C&#42;2^c =</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00292" /><CodeLine lineNumber="292"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//                     = (B + A) &#42; C&#39; + C&#42;(EB + EA)&#42;2^(n-e)&#42;2^c =</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00293" /><CodeLine lineNumber="293"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00294" /><CodeLine lineNumber="294"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   Let EC be the final error with EC = C&#42;(EB + EA)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00295" /><CodeLine lineNumber="295"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00296" /><CodeLine lineNumber="296"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//                     = (B + A)&#42;C&#39; + EC&#42;2^(n-e)&#42;2^c =</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00297" /><CodeLine lineNumber="297"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//                     = (B + A)&#42;C&#39; + EC&#42;2^(n-(e-c))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00298" /><CodeLine lineNumber="298"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00299" /><CodeLine lineNumber="299"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   Since EC is multiplied by 2^(n-(e-c)) the resulting error contains c</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00300" /><CodeLine lineNumber="300"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   less error bits than the input. c bits are shifted out to the left.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00301" /><CodeLine lineNumber="301"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// &#91;qed&#93;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00302" /><CodeLine lineNumber="302"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00303" /><CodeLine lineNumber="303"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/callingconv/#ac6aa1387c4375260e2468eb5a77fdb4cafd841a49aec1539bc88abc8ff9e170fb">C</a>.getBitWidth() != <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#a2e38c85003a042421cde1647632d0b72">A</a>.getBitWidth()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00304" /><CodeLine lineNumber="304"><span class="doxyHighlight">      ErrorMSBs = (unsigned)-1;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00305" /><CodeLine lineNumber="305"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">this</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00306" /><CodeLine lineNumber="306"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00307" /><CodeLine lineNumber="307"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00308" /><CodeLine lineNumber="308"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Multiplying by one is a no-op.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00309" /><CodeLine lineNumber="309"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/callingconv/#ac6aa1387c4375260e2468eb5a77fdb4cafd841a49aec1539bc88abc8ff9e170fb">C</a>.isOne()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00310" /><CodeLine lineNumber="310"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">this</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00311" /><CodeLine lineNumber="311"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00312" /><CodeLine lineNumber="312"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00313" /><CodeLine lineNumber="313"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Multiplying by zero removes the coefficient B and defines all bits.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00314" /><CodeLine lineNumber="314"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/callingconv/#ac6aa1387c4375260e2468eb5a77fdb4cafd841a49aec1539bc88abc8ff9e170fb">C</a>.isZero()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00315" /><CodeLine lineNumber="315"><span class="doxyHighlight">      ErrorMSBs = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00316" /><CodeLine lineNumber="316"><span class="doxyHighlight">      deleteB();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00317" /><CodeLine lineNumber="317"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00318" /><CodeLine lineNumber="318"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00319" /><CodeLine lineNumber="319"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// See Proof(2): Trailing zero bits indicate a left shift. This removes</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00320" /><CodeLine lineNumber="320"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// leading bits from the result even if they are undefined.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00321" /><CodeLine lineNumber="321"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-interleavedloadcombinepass-cpp-/polynomial/#a655616f261657236062b1639e62c2bb6">decErrorMSBs</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/callingconv/#ac6aa1387c4375260e2468eb5a77fdb4cafd841a49aec1539bc88abc8ff9e170fb">C</a>.countr&#95;zero());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00322" /><CodeLine lineNumber="322"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00323" /><CodeLine lineNumber="323"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#a2e38c85003a042421cde1647632d0b72">A</a> &#42;= <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/callingconv/#ac6aa1387c4375260e2468eb5a77fdb4cafd841a49aec1539bc88abc8ff9e170fb">C</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00324" /><CodeLine lineNumber="324"><span class="doxyHighlight">    pushBOperation(Mul, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/callingconv/#ac6aa1387c4375260e2468eb5a77fdb4cafd841a49aec1539bc88abc8ff9e170fb">C</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00325" /><CodeLine lineNumber="325"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">this</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00326" /><CodeLine lineNumber="326"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00327" /><CodeLine lineNumber="327"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00328" /><CodeLine lineNumber="328"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Apply a logical shift right on the polynomial</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00329" /><CodeLine lineNumber="329" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-interleavedloadcombinepass-cpp-/polynomial/#a403ea830c03b537cc0ac0137f162d6ed"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-interleavedloadcombinepass-cpp-/polynomial/#a9125cd76962bcc439d4376d8610b74c2">Polynomial</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-interleavedloadcombinepass-cpp-/polynomial/#a403ea830c03b537cc0ac0137f162d6ed">lshr</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint">APInt</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/callingconv/#ac6aa1387c4375260e2468eb5a77fdb4cafd841a49aec1539bc88abc8ff9e170fb">C</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00330" /><CodeLine lineNumber="330"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Theorem(1): (B + A + E&#42;2^(n-e)) &gt;&gt; 1 =&gt; (B &gt;&gt; 1) + (A &gt;&gt; 1) + E&#39;&#42;2^(n-e&#39;)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00331" /><CodeLine lineNumber="331"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//          where</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00332" /><CodeLine lineNumber="332"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//             e&#39; = e + 1,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00333" /><CodeLine lineNumber="333"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//             E is a e-bit number,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00334" /><CodeLine lineNumber="334"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//             E&#39; is a e&#39;-bit number,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00335" /><CodeLine lineNumber="335"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   holds under the following precondition:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00336" /><CodeLine lineNumber="336"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//          pre(1): A % 2 = 0</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00337" /><CodeLine lineNumber="337"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//          pre(2): e &lt; n, (see Theorem(2) for the trivial case with e=n)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00338" /><CodeLine lineNumber="338"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   where &gt;&gt; expresses a logical shift to the right, with adding zeros.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00339" /><CodeLine lineNumber="339"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00340" /><CodeLine lineNumber="340"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  We need to show that for every, E there is a E&#39;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00341" /><CodeLine lineNumber="341"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00342" /><CodeLine lineNumber="342"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  B = b&#95;h &#42; 2^(n-1) + b&#95;m &#42; 2 + b&#95;l</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00343" /><CodeLine lineNumber="343"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  A = a&#95;h &#42; 2^(n-1) + a&#95;m &#42; 2         (pre(1))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00344" /><CodeLine lineNumber="344"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00345" /><CodeLine lineNumber="345"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  where a&#95;h, b&#95;h, b&#95;l are single bits, and a&#95;m, b&#95;m are (n-2) bit numbers</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00346" /><CodeLine lineNumber="346"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00347" /><CodeLine lineNumber="347"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  Let X = (B + A + E&#42;2^(n-e)) &gt;&gt; 1</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00348" /><CodeLine lineNumber="348"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  Let Y = (B &gt;&gt; 1) + (A &gt;&gt; 1) + E&#42;2^(n-e) &gt;&gt; 1</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00349" /><CodeLine lineNumber="349"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00350" /><CodeLine lineNumber="350"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    X = &#91;B + A + E&#42;2^(n-e)&#93; &gt;&gt; 1 =</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00351" /><CodeLine lineNumber="351"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//      = &#91;  b&#95;h &#42; 2^(n-1) + b&#95;m &#42; 2 + b&#95;l +</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00352" /><CodeLine lineNumber="352"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//         + a&#95;h &#42; 2^(n-1) + a&#95;m &#42; 2 +</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00353" /><CodeLine lineNumber="353"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//         + E &#42; 2^(n-e) &#93; &gt;&gt; 1 =</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00354" /><CodeLine lineNumber="354"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00355" /><CodeLine lineNumber="355"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    The sum is built by putting the overflow of &#91;a&#95;m + b+n&#93; into the term</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00356" /><CodeLine lineNumber="356"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    2^(n-1). As there are no more bits beyond 2^(n-1) the overflow within</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00357" /><CodeLine lineNumber="357"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    this bit is discarded. This is expressed by % 2</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00358" /><CodeLine lineNumber="358"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00359" /><CodeLine lineNumber="359"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    The bit in position 0 cannot overflow into the term (b&#95;m + a&#95;m).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00360" /><CodeLine lineNumber="360"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00361" /><CodeLine lineNumber="361"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//      = &#91;  (&#91;b&#95;h + a&#95;h + (b&#95;m + a&#95;m) &gt;&gt; (n-2)&#93; % 2) &#42; 2^(n-1) +</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00362" /><CodeLine lineNumber="362"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//         + ((b&#95;m + a&#95;m) % 2^(n-2)) &#42; 2 +</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00363" /><CodeLine lineNumber="363"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//         + b&#95;l + E &#42; 2^(n-e) &#93; &gt;&gt; 1 =</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00364" /><CodeLine lineNumber="364"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00365" /><CodeLine lineNumber="365"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    The shift is computed by dividing the terms by 2 and by cutting off</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00366" /><CodeLine lineNumber="366"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    b&#95;l.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00367" /><CodeLine lineNumber="367"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00368" /><CodeLine lineNumber="368"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//      =    (&#91;b&#95;h + a&#95;h + (b&#95;m + a&#95;m) &gt;&gt; (n-2)&#93; % 2) &#42; 2^(n-2) +</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00369" /><CodeLine lineNumber="369"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//         + ((b&#95;m + a&#95;m) % 2^(n-2)) +</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00370" /><CodeLine lineNumber="370"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//         + E &#42; 2^(n-(e+1)) =</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00371" /><CodeLine lineNumber="371"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00372" /><CodeLine lineNumber="372"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    by the definition in the Theorem NaN = e&#39;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00373" /><CodeLine lineNumber="373"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00374" /><CodeLine lineNumber="374"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//      =    (&#91;b&#95;h + a&#95;h + (b&#95;m + a&#95;m) &gt;&gt; (n-2)&#93; % 2) &#42; 2^(n-2) +</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00375" /><CodeLine lineNumber="375"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//         + ((b&#95;m + a&#95;m) % 2^(n-2)) +</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00376" /><CodeLine lineNumber="376"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//         + E &#42; 2^(n-e&#39;) =</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00377" /><CodeLine lineNumber="377"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00378" /><CodeLine lineNumber="378"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    Compute Y by applying distributivity first</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00379" /><CodeLine lineNumber="379"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00380" /><CodeLine lineNumber="380"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    Y =  (B &gt;&gt; 1) + (A &gt;&gt; 1) + E&#42;2^(n-e&#39;) =</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00381" /><CodeLine lineNumber="381"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//      =    (b&#95;h &#42; 2^(n-1) + b&#95;m &#42; 2 + b&#95;l) &gt;&gt; 1 +</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00382" /><CodeLine lineNumber="382"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//         + (a&#95;h &#42; 2^(n-1) + a&#95;m &#42; 2) &gt;&gt; 1 +</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00383" /><CodeLine lineNumber="383"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//         + E &#42; 2^(n-e) &gt;&gt; 1 =</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00384" /><CodeLine lineNumber="384"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00385" /><CodeLine lineNumber="385"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    Again, the shift is computed by dividing the terms by 2 and by cutting</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00386" /><CodeLine lineNumber="386"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    off b&#95;l.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00387" /><CodeLine lineNumber="387"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00388" /><CodeLine lineNumber="388"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//      =     b&#95;h &#42; 2^(n-2) + b&#95;m +</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00389" /><CodeLine lineNumber="389"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//         +  a&#95;h &#42; 2^(n-2) + a&#95;m +</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00390" /><CodeLine lineNumber="390"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//         +  E &#42; 2^(n-(e+1)) =</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00391" /><CodeLine lineNumber="391"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00392" /><CodeLine lineNumber="392"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    Again, the sum is built by putting the overflow of &#91;a&#95;m + b+n&#93; into</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00393" /><CodeLine lineNumber="393"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    the term 2^(n-1). But this time there is room for a second bit in the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00394" /><CodeLine lineNumber="394"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    term 2^(n-2) we add this bit to a new term and denote it o&#95;h in a</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00395" /><CodeLine lineNumber="395"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    second step.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00396" /><CodeLine lineNumber="396"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00397" /><CodeLine lineNumber="397"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//      =    (&#91;b&#95;h + a&#95;h + (b&#95;m + a&#95;m) &gt;&gt; (n-2)&#93; &gt;&gt; 1) &#42; 2^(n-1) +</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00398" /><CodeLine lineNumber="398"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//         + (&#91;b&#95;h + a&#95;h + (b&#95;m + a&#95;m) &gt;&gt; (n-2)&#93; % 2) &#42; 2^(n-2) +</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00399" /><CodeLine lineNumber="399"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//         + ((b&#95;m + a&#95;m) % 2^(n-2)) +</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00400" /><CodeLine lineNumber="400"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//         + E &#42; 2^(n-(e+1)) =</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00401" /><CodeLine lineNumber="401"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00402" /><CodeLine lineNumber="402"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    Let o&#95;h = &#91;b&#95;h + a&#95;h + (b&#95;m + a&#95;m) &gt;&gt; (n-2)&#93; &gt;&gt; 1</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00403" /><CodeLine lineNumber="403"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    Further replace NaN by e&#39;.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00404" /><CodeLine lineNumber="404"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00405" /><CodeLine lineNumber="405"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//      =    o&#95;h &#42; 2^(n-1) +</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00406" /><CodeLine lineNumber="406"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//         + (&#91;b&#95;h + a&#95;h + (b&#95;m + a&#95;m) &gt;&gt; (n-2)&#93; % 2) &#42; 2^(n-2) +</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00407" /><CodeLine lineNumber="407"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//         + ((b&#95;m + a&#95;m) % 2^(n-2)) +</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00408" /><CodeLine lineNumber="408"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//         + E &#42; 2^(n-e&#39;) =</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00409" /><CodeLine lineNumber="409"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00410" /><CodeLine lineNumber="410"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    Move o&#95;h into the error term and construct E&#39;. To ensure that there is</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00411" /><CodeLine lineNumber="411"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    no 2^x with negative x, this step requires pre(2) (e &lt; n).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00412" /><CodeLine lineNumber="412"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00413" /><CodeLine lineNumber="413"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//      =    (&#91;b&#95;h + a&#95;h + (b&#95;m + a&#95;m) &gt;&gt; (n-2)&#93; % 2) &#42; 2^(n-2) +</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00414" /><CodeLine lineNumber="414"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//         + ((b&#95;m + a&#95;m) % 2^(n-2)) +</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00415" /><CodeLine lineNumber="415"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//         + o&#95;h &#42; 2^(e&#39;-1) &#42; 2^(n-e&#39;) +               | pre(2), move 2^(e&#39;-1)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00416" /><CodeLine lineNumber="416"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//                                                     | out of the old exponent</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00417" /><CodeLine lineNumber="417"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//         + E &#42; 2^(n-e&#39;) =</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00418" /><CodeLine lineNumber="418"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//      =    (&#91;b&#95;h + a&#95;h + (b&#95;m + a&#95;m) &gt;&gt; (n-2)&#93; % 2) &#42; 2^(n-2) +</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00419" /><CodeLine lineNumber="419"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//         + ((b&#95;m + a&#95;m) % 2^(n-2)) +</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00420" /><CodeLine lineNumber="420"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//         + &#91;o&#95;h &#42; 2^(e&#39;-1) + E&#93; &#42; 2^(n-e&#39;) +         | move 2^(e&#39;-1) out of</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00421" /><CodeLine lineNumber="421"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//                                                     | the old exponent</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00422" /><CodeLine lineNumber="422"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00423" /><CodeLine lineNumber="423"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    Let E&#39; = o&#95;h &#42; 2^(e&#39;-1) + E</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00424" /><CodeLine lineNumber="424"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00425" /><CodeLine lineNumber="425"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//      =    (&#91;b&#95;h + a&#95;h + (b&#95;m + a&#95;m) &gt;&gt; (n-2)&#93; % 2) &#42; 2^(n-2) +</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00426" /><CodeLine lineNumber="426"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//         + ((b&#95;m + a&#95;m) % 2^(n-2)) +</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00427" /><CodeLine lineNumber="427"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//         + E&#39; &#42; 2^(n-e&#39;)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00428" /><CodeLine lineNumber="428"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00429" /><CodeLine lineNumber="429"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    Because X and Y are distinct only in there error terms and E&#39; can be</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00430" /><CodeLine lineNumber="430"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    constructed as shown the theorem holds.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00431" /><CodeLine lineNumber="431"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// &#91;qed&#93;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00432" /><CodeLine lineNumber="432"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00433" /><CodeLine lineNumber="433"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// For completeness in case of the case e=n it is also required to show that</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00434" /><CodeLine lineNumber="434"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// distributivity can be applied.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00435" /><CodeLine lineNumber="435"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00436" /><CodeLine lineNumber="436"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// In this case Theorem(1) transforms to (the pre-condition on A can also be</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00437" /><CodeLine lineNumber="437"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// dropped)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00438" /><CodeLine lineNumber="438"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00439" /><CodeLine lineNumber="439"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Theorem(2): (B + A + E) &gt;&gt; 1 =&gt; (B &gt;&gt; 1) + (A &gt;&gt; 1) + E&#39;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00440" /><CodeLine lineNumber="440"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//          where</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00441" /><CodeLine lineNumber="441"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//             A, B, E, E&#39; are two&#39;s complement numbers with the same bit</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00442" /><CodeLine lineNumber="442"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//             width</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00443" /><CodeLine lineNumber="443"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00444" /><CodeLine lineNumber="444"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   Let A + B + E = X</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00445" /><CodeLine lineNumber="445"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   Let (B &gt;&gt; 1) + (A &gt;&gt; 1) = Y</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00446" /><CodeLine lineNumber="446"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00447" /><CodeLine lineNumber="447"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   Therefore we need to show that for every X and Y there is an E&#39; which</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00448" /><CodeLine lineNumber="448"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   makes the equation</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00449" /><CodeLine lineNumber="449"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00450" /><CodeLine lineNumber="450"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//     X = Y + E&#39;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00451" /><CodeLine lineNumber="451"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00452" /><CodeLine lineNumber="452"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   hold. This is trivially the case for E&#39; = X - Y.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00453" /><CodeLine lineNumber="453"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00454" /><CodeLine lineNumber="454"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// &#91;qed&#93;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00455" /><CodeLine lineNumber="455"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00456" /><CodeLine lineNumber="456"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Remark: Distributing lshr with and arbitrary number n can be expressed as</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00457" /><CodeLine lineNumber="457"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   ((((B + A) lshr 1) lshr 1) ... ) &#123;n times&#125;.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00458" /><CodeLine lineNumber="458"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// This construction induces n additional error bits at the left.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00459" /><CodeLine lineNumber="459"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00460" /><CodeLine lineNumber="460"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/callingconv/#ac6aa1387c4375260e2468eb5a77fdb4cafd841a49aec1539bc88abc8ff9e170fb">C</a>.getBitWidth() != <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#a2e38c85003a042421cde1647632d0b72">A</a>.getBitWidth()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00461" /><CodeLine lineNumber="461"><span class="doxyHighlight">      ErrorMSBs = (unsigned)-1;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00462" /><CodeLine lineNumber="462"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">this</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00463" /><CodeLine lineNumber="463"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00464" /><CodeLine lineNumber="464"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00465" /><CodeLine lineNumber="465"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/callingconv/#ac6aa1387c4375260e2468eb5a77fdb4cafd841a49aec1539bc88abc8ff9e170fb">C</a>.isZero())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00466" /><CodeLine lineNumber="466"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">this</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00467" /><CodeLine lineNumber="467"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00468" /><CodeLine lineNumber="468"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Test if the result will be zero</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00469" /><CodeLine lineNumber="469"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> shiftAmt = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/callingconv/#ac6aa1387c4375260e2468eb5a77fdb4cafd841a49aec1539bc88abc8ff9e170fb">C</a>.getZExtValue();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00470" /><CodeLine lineNumber="470"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (shiftAmt &gt;= <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/callingconv/#ac6aa1387c4375260e2468eb5a77fdb4cafd841a49aec1539bc88abc8ff9e170fb">C</a>.getBitWidth())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00471" /><CodeLine lineNumber="471"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-interleavedloadcombinepass-cpp-/polynomial/#afa933051dac38f62739216d984595e05">mul</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint">APInt</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/callingconv/#ac6aa1387c4375260e2468eb5a77fdb4cafd841a49aec1539bc88abc8ff9e170fb">C</a>.getBitWidth(), 0));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00472" /><CodeLine lineNumber="472"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00473" /><CodeLine lineNumber="473"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The proof that shiftAmt LSBs are zero for at least one summand is only</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00474" /><CodeLine lineNumber="474"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// possible for the constant number.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00475" /><CodeLine lineNumber="475"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00476" /><CodeLine lineNumber="476"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If this can be proven add shiftAmt to the error counter</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00477" /><CodeLine lineNumber="477"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// &#96;ErrorMSBs&#96;. Otherwise set all bits as undefined.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00478" /><CodeLine lineNumber="478"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#a2e38c85003a042421cde1647632d0b72">A</a>.countr&#95;zero() &lt; shiftAmt)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00479" /><CodeLine lineNumber="479"><span class="doxyHighlight">      ErrorMSBs = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#a2e38c85003a042421cde1647632d0b72">A</a>.getBitWidth();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00480" /><CodeLine lineNumber="480"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00481" /><CodeLine lineNumber="481"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-interleavedloadcombinepass-cpp-/polynomial/#a84aceefc69fca55a44b00abbe6c55a39">incErrorMSBs</a>(shiftAmt);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00482" /><CodeLine lineNumber="482"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00483" /><CodeLine lineNumber="483"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Apply the operation.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00484" /><CodeLine lineNumber="484"><span class="doxyHighlight">    pushBOperation(LShr, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/callingconv/#ac6aa1387c4375260e2468eb5a77fdb4cafd841a49aec1539bc88abc8ff9e170fb">C</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00485" /><CodeLine lineNumber="485"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#a2e38c85003a042421cde1647632d0b72">A</a> = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#a2e38c85003a042421cde1647632d0b72">A</a>.lshr(shiftAmt);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00486" /><CodeLine lineNumber="486"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00487" /><CodeLine lineNumber="487"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">this</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00488" /><CodeLine lineNumber="488"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00489" /><CodeLine lineNumber="489"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00490" /><CodeLine lineNumber="490"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Apply a sign-extend or truncate operation on the polynomial.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00491" /><CodeLine lineNumber="491" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-interleavedloadcombinepass-cpp-/polynomial/#a1655d28daf2213ac97e059dbca87415b"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-interleavedloadcombinepass-cpp-/polynomial/#a9125cd76962bcc439d4376d8610b74c2">Polynomial</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-interleavedloadcombinepass-cpp-/polynomial/#a1655d28daf2213ac97e059dbca87415b">sextOrTrunc</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> n) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00492" /><CodeLine lineNumber="492"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (n &lt; <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#a2e38c85003a042421cde1647632d0b72">A</a>.getBitWidth()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00493" /><CodeLine lineNumber="493"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Truncate: Clearly undefined Bits on the MSB side are removed</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00494" /><CodeLine lineNumber="494"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// if there are any.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00495" /><CodeLine lineNumber="495"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-interleavedloadcombinepass-cpp-/polynomial/#a655616f261657236062b1639e62c2bb6">decErrorMSBs</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#a2e38c85003a042421cde1647632d0b72">A</a>.getBitWidth() - n);</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00497" /><CodeLine lineNumber="497"><span class="doxyHighlight">      pushBOperation(Trunc, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint">APInt</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">sizeof</span><span class="doxyHighlight">(n) &#42; 8, n));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00498" /><CodeLine lineNumber="498"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00499" /><CodeLine lineNumber="499"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (n &gt; <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#a2e38c85003a042421cde1647632d0b72">A</a>.getBitWidth()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00500" /><CodeLine lineNumber="500"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Extend: Clearly extending first and adding later is different</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00501" /><CodeLine lineNumber="501"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// to adding first and extending later in all extended bits.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00502" /><CodeLine lineNumber="502"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-interleavedloadcombinepass-cpp-/polynomial/#a84aceefc69fca55a44b00abbe6c55a39">incErrorMSBs</a>(n - <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#a2e38c85003a042421cde1647632d0b72">A</a>.getBitWidth());</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00516" /><CodeLine lineNumber="516"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#a2e38c85003a042421cde1647632d0b72">A</a>.getBitWidth() != o.A.getBitWidth())</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00552" /><CodeLine lineNumber="552"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00559" /><CodeLine lineNumber="559"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00687" /><CodeLine lineNumber="687"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Test if the VectorInfo can be part of an interleaved load with the</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00689" /><CodeLine lineNumber="689"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00758" /><CodeLine lineNumber="758"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> j = 0; j &lt; Factor; j++) &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00762" /><CodeLine lineNumber="762"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00774" /><CodeLine lineNumber="774"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00775" /><CodeLine lineNumber="775"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// ShuffleVectorInst specialization to compute vector information.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00776" /><CodeLine lineNumber="776"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00777" /><CodeLine lineNumber="777"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// \\param SVI ShuffleVectorInst to operate on</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00778" /><CodeLine lineNumber="778"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// \\param Result Result of the computation</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00779" /><CodeLine lineNumber="779"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00780" /><CodeLine lineNumber="780"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Compute the left and the right side vector information and merge them by</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00781" /><CodeLine lineNumber="781"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// applying the shuffle operation. This function also ensures that the left</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00782" /><CodeLine lineNumber="782"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// and right side have compatible loads. This means that all loads are with</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00783" /><CodeLine lineNumber="783"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// in the same basic block and are based on the same pointer.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00784" /><CodeLine lineNumber="784"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00785" /><CodeLine lineNumber="785"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// \\returns false if no sensible information can be gathered.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00786" /><CodeLine lineNumber="786" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-interleavedloadcombinepass-cpp-/vectorinfo/#a512a96bc40ecd933dab9e74af6be51b0"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-interleavedloadcombinepass-cpp-/vectorinfo/#a512a96bc40ecd933dab9e74af6be51b0">computeFromSVI</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/shufflevectorinst">ShuffleVectorInst</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-interleavedloadcombinepass-cpp-/vectorinfo/#a094276da323ffdce4edaa2897e65462a">SVI</a>, VectorInfo &amp;Result,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00787" /><CodeLine lineNumber="787"><span class="doxyHighlight">                             </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/datalayout">DataLayout</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#ad467c4ab9119043f9b7750ab986be61a">DL</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00788" /><CodeLine lineNumber="788"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/fixedvectortype">FixedVectorType</a> &#42;ArgTy =</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00789" /><CodeLine lineNumber="789"><span class="doxyHighlight">        <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ac4fc845f5ed92de63cd4474f128f5fc5">cast&lt;FixedVectorType&gt;</a>(<a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-interleavedloadcombinepass-cpp-/vectorinfo/#a094276da323ffdce4edaa2897e65462a">SVI</a>-&gt;getOperand(0)-&gt;getType());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00790" /><CodeLine lineNumber="790"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00791" /><CodeLine lineNumber="791"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Compute the left hand vector information.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00792" /><CodeLine lineNumber="792"><span class="doxyHighlight">    VectorInfo <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/x86/x86partialreduction-cpp/#a9e1483f7215664a2315c53c3558d9a8d">LHS</a>(ArgTy);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00793" /><CodeLine lineNumber="793"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!<a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-interleavedloadcombinepass-cpp-/vectorinfo/#ae703f01e30a1aef1bcd4b1c234b5ef32">compute</a>(<a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-interleavedloadcombinepass-cpp-/vectorinfo/#a094276da323ffdce4edaa2897e65462a">SVI</a>-&gt;getOperand(0), LHS, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#ad467c4ab9119043f9b7750ab986be61a">DL</a>))</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00795" /><CodeLine lineNumber="795"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00796" /><CodeLine lineNumber="796"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Compute the right hand vector information.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00801" /><CodeLine lineNumber="801"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Neither operand produced sensible results?</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00802" /><CodeLine lineNumber="802"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!LHS.BB &amp;&amp; !RHS.BB)</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00804" /><CodeLine lineNumber="804"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Only RHS produced sensible results?</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00805" /><CodeLine lineNumber="805"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!LHS.BB) &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00808" /><CodeLine lineNumber="808"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00809" /><CodeLine lineNumber="809"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Only LHS produced sensible results?</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00810" /><CodeLine lineNumber="810"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!RHS.BB) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
